column1: Bosscat Kitchen & Libations////We came for dinner and cocktails. The restaurant has a great vibe and the service was good. The drinks were tasty. They served the old fashioned with an ice block
column2: which I love. I ordered the BC Press
column4: but I swear it tasted like there was mayonnaise on it
column5: although not mentioned in the description. The fries are thick cut and cooked crisp
column6: which were yummy. The mac-n-cheese was fantastic too!
